testcase.classname: As a merchant, I want to be able to add parcel via API connection.
testcase.name: merchant When sending a POST request to the api/merchant-parcel/add endpoint with valid authorization
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/merchant-parcel/add" path parameters...............passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing 1, 1, "Jane Due", "145879632147" and "318 WARREN ST, Brooklyn, NY 11206" information to send to the api expressadd endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "POST" request and saves the returned response.......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Parcel is added"..passed
